body:
Quoting [v36r3](https://gitlab.cern.ch/gaudi/Gaudi/-/tags/v36r3): "This is a bugfix release with a couple of changes that technically are backward incompatible
because they fix issues that might have gone unnoticed."

For this reason, I am marking v36r2 as preferred to give dependents an opportunity to test (all dependents are in third-party repositories).

Maintainers tag: @drbenmorgan @vvolkl
title: [gaudi] new versions 36.1 36.2 36.3
